text: Henry Butler (September 21, 1949 - July 2, 2018) was an American jazz pianist. He was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. Butler recorded for several record labels, including Impulse, Windham Hill, and Basin Street Records. Butler was blinded by glaucoma in infancy.Spartan Saga: Henry Butler . Michigan State Alumni Magazine, December 19, 2011. Butler died of end-stage colorectal cancer in New York City on July 2, 2018 at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Culture Catch Music Salon & Dusty Wright Interview with Henry * Bonnaroo Interview with Henry by Ellen Mallernee Category:1949 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:African-American musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:American pianists Category:American photographers Category:American R&B; musicians Category:Musicians from New Orleans Category:African-American photographers
title: Henry Butler
